Voted 2022 Best Lodging In Summit County, Colorado!

STAY. INDEPENDENT. TOGETHER.

BOOK YOUR VISIT WITH US

BOOK YOUR VISIT

A VARIETY OF OPTIONS FOR A VARIETY OF LIFESTYLES.

At our core, we believe that lodging cost should not be a deterrent to travel.

That’s why we set out to offer an array of room styles, taking inspiration from shared bunk experiences while traveling abroad, as well as considering the more lavish options of private rooms with mountain view terraces. There is no shortage of choices in between these two ends of the spectrum, with micro rooms, private bunks, and family + pet upgrade options.

Our rooms feature thoughtfully selected furniture and linens, immersive displays from local artists, floor-to-ceiling windows, and secure storage for personal belongings.

From budget to boujee, whatever type of traveler you are, we’ve got you covered at The Pad.

Shared Dorms
Room Details

For that international vibe with accentuated attention to detail, our shared dorms feature custom-made Twin XL bunk beds, storage lockers, and individual shelf, reading light and charging station outlets.

Private Group Room
Room Details

Are you traveling with a group, want everyone to have their own bed, but somehow keep it affordable? Consider this space your private bungalow, where you get a 6 bed bunk room for you + personal acquaintances.

Micro Room
Room Details

Featuring Full XL mattresses while continuing to offer a smaller footprint, so as to keep the price point low. This room is ideal for those who want their own space, but don’t mind sharing bathrooms.

Micro Room + Bath
Room Details

Our economical take on traditional lodging, this space features a Full XL or Twin XL bunk beds + private bath.

Family Room
Room Details

The perfect space for a small family or group, this room offers both a Queen bed and a Twin XL bunk bed. Occupants of this room utilize our shared bathroom space.

Private Room
Room Details

For the traditionalist, this room has standard lodging amenities, featuring a queen bed, private bath, desk workspace & a mini-fridge.

Deluxe Private Room
Room Details

The most luxurious of options at The Pad, this room features a spacious floor plan, king bed + sleeper futon, desk work space and a private balcony with mountain + river views.

Container Room
Room Details

Enjoy the most unique & sustainable option at The Pad and spend your stay in a full-sized shipping container! These rooms are our suite offering, complete with spacious bath, in-room kitchenette, desk work space, queen bed + sleeper sofa.

Please Note: Dogs are allowed in select private rooms for an additional fee, and must be registered with the front desk. Pets assisting person with disabilities will be allowed for no additional charge. Guests keeping unregistered pets will be charged a $300.00 cleaning fee.
